episodes.title: Testimonies of Psychological Abuse: Inside the Desteni Cult
episodes.description:
Link to read the testimonies: https://leavingdesteni.wordpress.com/2024/06/27/testimonies-of-psychological-abuse-inside-the-desteni-cult/ 

"I have received the following 3 testimonies from former members of the Desteni cult who were involved in its early days. Two of them spent time at the Desteni Farm directly interacting with Bernard Poolman (photo above) and Susan Spies. If you are considering joining Self-Perfected and purchasing TechnoTutor, these testimonies are relevant to you as well as to former and current members of these groups. Bernard Poolman was the originator of the TechnoTutor project and the mentor of the founders of TechnoTutor in North America: Katie Conklin, Cameron Cope and Avery Williams. These individuals employ many of the unethical techniques of psychological influence found in Desteni and indoctrinate recruits with the “teachings” of Bernard Poolman"

episodes.title: Part 2 - Leaving the Cult - Desteni, TechnoTutor, Self-Perfected - Ex-Cult Members Speak Out
episodes.description:
In this conversation, we discuss how Desteni’s “self-forgiveness” is NOT the type of self-forgiveness that promotes mental health and personal growth, but rather a brainwashing tool used to bypass a person’s critical thinking or conscious mind and remove resistance to the information that Desteni/TechnoTutor/Self-Perfected presents as “facts” and seeks to indoctrinate people with. 

Link to Derren Brown - Messiah - Recommended episode   

https://youtu.be/6UE-1Thzj_0

“In the episode, Brown travels to the United States to try to convince five influential figures that he has special abilities in their particular field of expertise: psychic powers, Christian evangelism, New Age theories, alien abduction and contacting the dead, with the objective of getting them to endorse him as a practitioner in their field.”

Visit leavingdesteni.wordpress.com
